message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is way out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd need to see a price closer to $12,000 to make it work.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I believe this price reflects the value this product will bring you.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to find a middle ground, but $17,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend. I'm willing to increase my offer to $13,000, but that's as high as I can go.
